name: Ghost Party (TheGamer)
description:
You and two of your ghostly friends are going to have a party of adventuring in this platforming game. Do you have what it takes to work together by solving the puzzle or raging each other out? Let's play!

Music:

  • Main Menu Music (Made by Boscaceoil)
  • In-Game Music (Kahoot Lobby Music)

Arts and Animation:

  • All by me using Piskel and Adobe Photoshop

Game Engine:

  • Construct 2
